page.title: 14Schools,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Warren Road Primary School was built in 1939,with some hutted accomodation which is being re-built in 1985/86.It has 647 pupils and a staff of 24.There is a swimming pool.Children have a choice of a variety of clubs outside school hours,and there is a school orchestra and choir. The Highway Primary,built in 1961,has 200 children and 7 teachers.It has a swimming pool.There is a school orchestra and a choir,and children can play cricket,chess and netball. Green Street Green Primary was built in 1907,and has 320 pupils and 13 members of staff.The school has a heated swimming pool. Charterhouse is a secondary school which is closing in the Summer of 1985.
